title: Infy's 7% drop hints at further weakness for tech counters - Economic Times
content: Infy's 7% drop hints at further weakness for tech counters  Economic Times
description: The sell-off on Monday led to Infosys' market value eroding by â‚¹53,500 crore. The Bengaluru-based company's earnings disappointment came on the heels of a lower than expected March quarter result by Mumbai-headquartered Tata Consultancy Services (TCS).
